name: TROUBLE JUICE
description:
Trouble Juice is a Side Scrolling Shooter Roguelike set in a TV show tournament that is broadcasted across the universe.
Become the ultimate champion and earn your place in the galaxy's hall of fame!

UNLOCK STUFF IN THE ACHIEVEMENT BINGO!


Clear a row, column or diagonal of achievements to unlock new juices, characters and alternate costumes!
Can you clear the entire board?


Easy to pick up, hard to put down.
Runs are short and packed with action.


Buy juices from Juice Guy that upgrade your gun, mobility, health and other things.
Experiment with different combinations to find what's the best mix!


You can also choose to shoot Juice Guy and get some health.
Don't worry, he can't die.
However, he will remember...


Every character has their own special ability which uses the stamina bar.
